meanings.definition: The quality of being extensive or having great extent.
meanings.sent1: The extensities of the desert seemed endless under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: The extensities of the ocean fascinated the young explorer.
meanings.sent3: The extensities of the pizza toppings made it look like a colorful mosaic.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him spanned the extensities of time and space.
meanings.sent5: The extensities of the forest enveloped her in a sense of tranquility.

meanings.definition: The range or scope of something.
meanings.sent1: The extensities of the library included books from all genres.
meanings.sent2: She marveled at the extensities of knowledge available on the internet.
meanings.sent3: The extensities of his imagination knew no bounds.
meanings.sent4: The extensities of the universe left him in awe of its vastness.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the extensities of the city, she discovered hidden gems in every corner.

meanings.definition: The amount of space or area covered by something.
meanings.sent1: The extensities of the carpet in the living room made it cozy.
meanings.sent2: The extensities of the garden were filled with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The extensities of the cake left everyone at the party satisfied.
meanings.sent4: The extensities of the painting covered the entire gallery wall.
meanings.sent5: She admired the extensities of the mural that depicted a historical event.
